briefTitle: Clinical Study to Assess the Long-term Safety and Tolerability of ACT 064992 in Patients With Symptomatic Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension
officialTitle: Long-term Single-arm Open-label Extension Study of the SERAPHIN Study, to Assess the Safety and Tolerability of ACT 064992 in Patients With Symptomatic Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension
summary: The main objective of the AC 055 303/SERAPHIN OL study, which will follow the AC 055 302/SERAPHIN study, will be to assess the long-term safety and tolerability of ACT 064992 in patients with symptomatic PAH.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) up to 28 Days After Study Treatment Discontinuation
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Up to 28 days after study treatment discontinuation (Up to 12 years)
